attributes.action: Plea to celtic football club not to sign Leigh Griffiths
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to bring to the attention of The Celtic Football Club, that the signing of a Mr Leigh Griffiths will greatly upset the supporters and cause a huge sense of unrest within the celtic community.  The club is for the supporters and we should not be subjected to such a motion that will cause great distress to the harmony of the football club within and out.
